title: The Off-Shell Massive Hypermultiplets Revisited
abstract: On the base of the notion of N=2 abelian Yang-Mills supergeometry with constant curvature, we propose an off-shell formulation for the massive q-hypermultiplet and complex $\omega$-hypermultiplet in the standard harmonic superspase without central charge variables. The corresponding superpropagators are derived.
